subject: [perl #43150] [TODO] Relocate shared libs check for solaris?
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Paul Cochrane 
# Please include the string:  [perl #43150]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In config/init/hints/solaris.pm there is the todo item related to a
shared libraries check:

# XXX Should this go into the shlibs.pl Configure.pl unit instead?

A decision should be made as to whether or not this should happen, and
if it should happen then it should be implemented.
